mainBoard.name: Dream Fighter
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever Dream Fighter blocks or is blocked by a creature, Dream Fighter and that creature phase out.

rulings.text: Dream Fighter affects all creatures that end up blocking it, including ones that are members of bands.

If Dream Fighter is assigned to block a creature with Flanking, the Flanking ability and the Dream Fighter ability both trigger. The active player’s Flanking effect is put on the stack first and resolves after the Dream Fighter’s phasing out effect happen, so the Flanking does nothing.

mainBoard.text: Whenever Dream Fighter blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Dream Fighter and that creature phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. Each one phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

mainBoard.name: Mystical Tutor
mainBoard.originalText: Search your library for an instant, interrupt, mana source, or sorcery card and reveal that card to all players. Shuffle your library and put the revealed card back on top of it.

rulings.text: The “shuffle and put the card on top” is a single action. If an effect causes the top card of the library to be face up, the second card down is not revealed.

mainBoard.text: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

foreignData.name: Einmischung

mainBoard.name: Meddle
mainBoard.originalText: Target spell, which targets a single creature, targets another creature of your choice instead. The new target must be legal.

rulings.text: Only works on spells with a single target, where that target is a creature. Will not work on spells that target a single creature and a player, for example.

mainBoard.text: If target spell has only one target and that target is a creature, change that spell's target to another creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: A lie always returns; be careful how you catch it.

foreignData.name: Auflösung
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch Deiner Wahl. Entferne diesen Spruch ganz aus dem Spiel.

mainBoard.name: Dissipate
mainBoard.originalText: Counter target spell. Remove that spell card from the game.

rulings.text: If the spell is not countered (because the spell it targets can't be countered), then it does not get exiled.
The card does not go to the graveyard before being exiled.

mainBoard.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

foreignData.name: Kraftverlust
foreignData.text: Der Zielspruch wird neutralisiert, wenn dessen Urheber nicht zusätzlich {X} ausgibt. Er muß alles verfügbare Mana aus seinem Manavorrat und seinen Ländern ausgeben, bis {X} bezahlt ist: wenn benötigt, kann er auch andere Manaquellen heranziehen.

mainBoard.name: Power Sink
mainBoard.originalText:
Counter target spell unless that spell's caster pays an additional o
X. That player draws and pays all mana from lands and mana pool until o
X is paid; he or she may also draw and pay mana from other sources if desired.

rulings.text: Does not increase the mana cost of the spell. It just requires a separate expenditure in order for it to succeed.

When this spell resolves, you either pay X mana or let your lands become tapped. The lands that become tapped are not “tapped for mana”. If you choose to pay, you may pay the X mana using whatever mana abilities you want to use.

Only lands that actually have mana abilities will get tapped. This includes basic lands and lands with mana abilities printed on them, as well as lands which have been granted a mana ability by some effect.

mainBoard.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Never taunt an embermage, 'What are you going to do about it?'"
—Akin, seasoned askari

foreignData.name: Einäscherung
foreignData.text: Die Einäscherung fügt einem Spieler oder einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Eine Kreatur, der durch Einäscherung Schaden zugefügt wurde, kann in diesem Zug nicht regenerieren.

mainBoard.name: Incinerate
mainBoard.originalText: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature damaged by Incinerate cannot regenerate this turn.

rulings.text: Regeneration abilities that would affect that creature can still be activated; they just won’t do anything. The creature can’t be regenerated for any reason, even if an effect other than Incinerate would deal lethal damage to it or otherwise destroy it.

mainBoard.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Scouts
mainBoard.originalText: Put three Goblin Scout tokens into play. Treat these tokens as 1/1 red creatures with mountainwalk that count as Goblins (if defending player controls any mountains, these creatures are unblockable).

rulings.text: The tokens are of creature type Goblin and Scout. They are affected by things that affect Goblins.
The tokens have ‘Mountainwalk’ in their text, and will be affected by text-changing effects accordingly.

mainBoard.text: Create three 1/1 red Goblin Scout creature tokens with mountainwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
